mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_BOARD (BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE ,ID, TITLE, CONTENT, DELFLAG, REGDATE) VALUES(BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_type}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_BOARD SET CONTENT = #{content} WHERE BOARD_SEQ=#{board_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE ,ID, TITLE, CONTENT, DELFLAG, REGDATE FROM BOOK_BOARD WHERE BOARD_SEQ=#{board_seq}
SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE ,ID, TITLE, CONTENT, DELFLAG, REGDATE FROM BOOK_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC
